title: ‘Keep pace’ or fall behind: CryptoUK says US-aligned rules key to UK crypto revival
contentSnippet: The Bank of England is launching a consultation on new stablecoin rules that closely mirror the US’s approach to fiat-pegged crypto assets.

title: Bitcoin crash to $104K was ‘flush,’ not crypto cycle ‘failure’
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s four-day crash has initiated a healthy reset among investors, with momentum limited until long-term holders stop selling their BTC, according to Glassnode.

title: SpaceX moves $257M in Bitcoin, reignites questions over its crypto play
contentSnippet: The SpaceX-labelled wallets made their second large-scale Bitcoin transfer in three months, raising speculation of a sale as the company faces growing competition.

title: Bitcoin Drops as Market ‘Flushes Excess Leverage:’ Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 21, 2025

title: OCC Chief Plays Down Stablecoin 'Bank Run' Fears
contentSnippet: Jonathan Gould dismissed deposit flight fears as banking groups demanded Congress close GENIUS Act “loopholes” allowing for stablecoin yield.

title: Argo’s creditor grabs 87.5% stake in struggling miner in bold takeover move
contentSnippet: Argo Blockchain will delist from the London Stock Exchange after its main creditor, Growler Mining, seized control through a debt-for-equity swap.

title: Coinbase Acquires Crypto Fundraising Firm Echo for $375M
contentSnippet: Echo's platform allows startups to raise funds directly from their communities, and will remain a standalone platform.

title: Bitcoin Battles Key Technical Levels as Uptober Momentum Fades
contentSnippet: BTC slips below $108,000 and trades between major moving averages, with crucial support and resistance levels now in focus.

title: Bitcoin Falls Below $108K Amid $320M Liquidations as Excess Leverage Gets Flushed Out
contentSnippet: More than $320 million in liquidations hit as bitcoin slipped under $108,000 and total crypto market value fell 3.2%

title: 'Have a Go' Australian Traders Top Global Charts for Meme Coin Holdings: Kraken
contentSnippet: Kraken’s latest data shows Australians are diversifying beyond Bitcoin, favoring Ethereum, Solana, and meme coins such as WIF, PEPE and BONK.

title: Debt-Fueled AI Pivot Puts Bitcoin Miners to the Test
contentSnippet: Record debt and convertible note issuances signal a strategic shift as miners chase growth beyond bitcoin, but execution risk and revenue generation now take center stage.

title: How to use Grok 4 for smarter crypto research before you invest
contentSnippet: Turn social hype into smart signals with Grok 4: scan sentiment, summarize fundamentals and confirm onchain data before investing.

title: DPRK Hackers Use 'EtherHiding' to Host Malware on Ethereum, BNB Blockchains: Google
contentSnippet: Google’s Threat Intelligence Group has linked North Korean hackers to EtherHiding, blockchain malware previously used by criminal groups.

title: Ethereum fails again above $4K as traders grow frustrated with shakeouts
contentSnippet: Ether ran into resistance at $4,000 as the absence of new buyers and weak spot Ethereum flows threatened ETH price dropping to $3,100 next.

title: U.S. Crypto Coalition Warns Bank Data Fees Could Cut Off Stablecoins and Wallets
contentSnippet: Fintech and crypto groups are urging the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau to stop banks charging for consumer data access, saying the move would undermine open banking and disconnect crypto wallet

title: Crypto, Fintech push back against banks’ war on open banking
contentSnippet: The Blockchain Association, Crypto Council for Innovation and fintech allies urged the CFPB to finalize an open banking rule ensuring consumers, not banks, control their data.

title: Bitcoin eyes CME gap below as BTC price dips 2.5%, risks $100K collapse
contentSnippet: Bitcoin price dropped 2.5% on Tuesday in an attempt to fill the latest weekend CME futures gap, while traders warned that $100,000 could fail as support.

title: 日銀副総裁、ステーブルコインが国際決済の中核担う可能性を指摘
contentSnippet: 日銀の氷見野副総裁は21日、ステーブルコインが国際決済システムの主要プレーヤーとして浮上する可能性があると指摘。世界の資産の半分がノンバンク保有で規制の枠組みが追いつかない現状に警鐘を鳴らした。

title: British Columbia to Permanently Ban New Crypto Mining Projects From Grid
contentSnippet: The ban is part of an effort to manage electricity demand and ensure industrial development is powered by clean electricity.

title: US political turmoil tests ‘institutional confidence’ as crypto ETFs bleed
contentSnippet: The outflows came as “No Kings” protests swept across the US amid a prolonged government shutdown and political division, deepening market risk aversion.

title: ヴィタリック、ゼロ知識証明を10倍高速化する新技術「GKRプロトコル」を解説
contentSnippet: イーサリアム共同創設者ヴィタリック・ブテリン氏が、ZK証明を高速化する新技術「GKRプロトコル」を解説した。従来のSTARKと比較して約10分の1のコストで検証が可能になるという。長期目標「Lean Ethereum」の実現に向けた重要技術として注目される。

title: Bitcoin mining in 2025, explained: From hashrate to rewards
contentSnippet: Discover how Bitcoin mining runs in 2025: From halving rewards and ASIC rigs to mining pools, hashprice shifts and power use.

title: DOGE Consolidates Near Lows, but Watch $0.194 for Breakdown or Short-Cover Rally

title: SBI系ビットポイント、法人のイーサリアム活用支援を強化

contentSnippet: Coinbase wants AI safe harbors, blockchain analytics recognition, and zero-knowledge proof adoption to replace outdated compliance systems.

title: Bitcoin Braces for First Inflation Test Since US Shutdown
contentSnippet: Analysts expects a measured market reaction to Friday's CPI report, noting that tariff concerns and labor data outweigh the inflation print.

title: 片山さつき氏、財務大臣に起用　暗号資産規制整備にも期待

title: X、ユーザーネーム市場を開設し最高100万ドルで販売開始

title: 株価大幅下落のソラナ・カンパニー、私募株ロックアップ解除を予定通り実施へ
contentSnippet: パンテラ・キャピタルが支援するソラナ・カンパニーは、株価下落する中、私募株のロックアップ解除を予定通り実施すると発表。「絆創膏を一気に剥がす」アプローチで、市場の圧力に対処する方針を示した。

title: ナスダック上場グリーンレーン、165億円調達でベラチェーン（BERA）戦略を開始
contentSnippet: 米グリーンレーン・ホールディングスが1.1億ドルの私募増資を実施し、仮想通貨BERAの保有戦略を開始すると発表した。ポリチェーン・キャピタル主導で上場企業として最大規模のベラ保有者を目指す。

title: Solana Company Touts Conviction as Investors Gain Right to Sell Shares

title: アマゾンAWSの大規模障害、コインベースやロビンフッドにも影響

title: パンプファン、ミームコインローンチ市場を再び支配　日次1.5億円収益維持＝報道

title: Asia’s Stablecoin Race Sees Top Companies Vie for Dominance, Test Policy Lines

title: Senate Republicans Call for Own Meeting With Crypto CEOs After Democrats' Sitdown
contentSnippet: GOP lawmakers are scheduling a followup meeting with crypto CEOs after they meet this week with Senate Democrats on the market structure bill, sources say.

title: X to Launch Handle Marketplace, Prices Rare Usernames Up to Seven Figures
contentSnippet: X's new marketplace lets Premium subscribers claim inactive usernames, with rare handles priced up to seven figures.

title: Dogecoin Firm House of Doge Acquires Controlling Share in Italian Soccer Club
contentSnippet: House of Doge, the Dogecoin Foundation's commercial arm, is betting big on a European soccer club from Italy's Serie C league.
